languages.text: После нескольких показательных ударов консорциум снова исправно присылает руду. Однако другие поставщики, устрашенные агрессией, не спешат заключать контракты с Вольным Торговцем.

After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: После нескольких показательных ударов консорциум снова исправно присылает руду. Однако другие поставщики, устрашенные агрессией, не спешат заключать контракты с Вольным Торговцем.

traits.locale_text: After a series of demonstrative attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.
Once caught in your web, the Chartist loses his autonomy and becomes a submissive vassal.

After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.
Once caught in your web, the chartist is forced to give up their autonomy and become a submissive vassal.
Once caught in your web, the chartist is forced to give up their autonomy and become a submissive vassal.

After a series of demonstrative attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Après une série d'attaques ciblées, le consortium accepte de reprendre les livraisons de minerai sans interruption. Pour autant, les autres fournisseurs, refroidis par cette démonstration de force, ne sont pas pressés de signer à leur tour un contrat avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Après une série d'attaques ciblées, le consortium accepte de reprendre les livraisons de minerai sans interruption. Pour autant, les autres fournisseurs, refroidis par cette démonstration de force, ne sont pas pressés de signer à leur tour un contrat avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: 一連の激しい攻撃の後、連合体は鉱石の出荷を中断することなく再開することに同意した。しかし、この攻撃的な態度に恐れをなした他のサプライヤーは、自由開拓者との契約を急ごうとはしなかった。
languages.original_text: After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 一連の激しい攻撃の後、連合体は鉱石の出荷を中断することなく再開することに同意した。しかし、この攻撃的な態度に恐れをなした他のサプライヤーは、自由開拓者との契約を急ごうとはしなかった。

languages.text: 你发动了一系列咄咄逼人的攻击，对方最终同意恢复铁矿石运输，保证再也不会中断供应。然而，其他供应商却被你盛气凌人的态度吓坏了，与你签订合约之前会再三考虑。
languages.original_text: After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 你发动了一系列咄咄逼人的攻击，对方最终同意恢复铁矿石运输，保证再也不会中断供应。然而，其他供应商却被你盛气凌人的态度吓坏了，与你签订合约之前会再三考虑。

languages.text: Tras una serie de ataques precisos, el consorcio acepta reanudar los envíos de mineral sin interrupción. Sin embargo, otros proveedores, intimidados por estos actos de violencia, no se ven muy inclinados a firmar contratos con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Tras una serie de ataques precisos, el consorcio acepta reanudar los envíos de mineral sin interrupción. Sin embargo, otros proveedores, intimidados por estos actos de violencia, no se ven muy inclinados a firmar contratos con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Nach einer Reihe gezielter Angriffe stimmt das Konsortium zu, die Erzlieferungen ohne Unterbrechungen wieder aufzunehmen. Allerdings zeigen sich andere Lieferanten durch das aggressive Verhalten eingeschüchtert und verlieren das Interesse daran, Verträge mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu schließen.
languages.original_text: After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Nach einer Reihe gezielter Angriffe stimmt das Konsortium zu, die Erzlieferungen ohne Unterbrechungen wieder aufzunehmen. Allerdings zeigen sich andere Lieferanten durch das aggressive Verhalten eingeschüchtert und verlieren das Interesse daran, Verträge mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu schließen.

languages.text: Bir dizi hedefli saldırının ardından konsorsiyum, cevher sevkiyatlarına kesintisiz olarak devam etmeyi kabul ediyor. Ancak bu saldırganlık gösterisinden gözü korkan diğer tedarikçiler, Hür Tacir ile sözleşme imzalamaya pek hevesli değil.
languages.original_text: After a series of pointed attacks, the consortium assents to resuming the ore shipments without interruptions. However, other suppliers, intimidated by this show of aggression, are in no hurry to sign contracts with the Rogue Trader.
